com.cmput301f18t20.medicalphotorecord

Class ShortCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f18t20.medicalphotorecord.ShortCode

  • public class ShortCode
extends java.lang.Object
    A short code that gets put into the elasticsearch index when the user wants to log in on another device. If the user enters the value held in "shortSecurityCode" member, it will give them "securityToken" which will allow them to login to the UserID held in the securityToken.
